( AP ) - State lottery officials say a $ 2 million winning ticket was sold to a player in northeast Kansas during the weekend Powerball drawing .
Officials declined to say Monday exactly where the ticket was drawn .

RelatedSentence: The winning ticket matched the first five numbers drawn Saturday , which were 23-32-39-47-49 .
The player also purchased a Power Play option which doubled the prize from $ 1 million to $ 2 million .
